content: https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo-bisect-rustc/pull/79 adds ANSI escape code color support and std stream output formatting improvements.

Chris Simpkins said:

https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo-bisect-rustc/pull/79 adds ANSI escape code color support and std stream output formatting improvements.

Merged
@Santiago Pastorino Can we push a release so that @bjorn3 can confirm that the ANSI codes play nicely with the new bisect-rustc bot in development?
I am currently not reading the actual output of cargo bisect-rustc, as I don't seem to be able to access the logs using the api. Instead I just post a link to the github actions run.
@bjorn3 Got it. Thanks. Do you know if Actions supports ANSI escape codes? IIRC they are supported on Travis

Actions seems to strip it away completely. It doesn't even show colors in the log view:

At https://github.com/bjorn3/rustc_codegen_cranelift/runs/641843380?check_suite_focus=true#step:10:255 hyperfine should emit colors, but github actions shows none.
